mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.status,a.order_on,a.actual_price,a.goods_price,b.link_man,b.mobile,b.address, b.province_str,b.city_str,b.district_str,b.code,a.pay_id,a.remark,a.create_time FROM order_user a LEFT JOIN address b ON a.address_id = b.id ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT a.id,a.status,a.order_on,a.actual_price,a.goods_price,b.link_man,b.mobile,b.address, b.province_str,b.city_str,b.district_str,b.code,a.pay_id,a.remark,a.create_time FROM order_user a LEFT JOIN address b ON a.address_id = b.id WHERE 1=1
AND a.order_on LIKE '%${searchName}%'
OR b.link_man LIKE '%${searchName}%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
